summary: Online store payment system with simulated payments and passcode-protected admin panel for managing items
architectural_notes: Admin panel protected by hardcoded passcode (3415)
Two-interface design: admin for item management, customer for shopping
Embeddable design for Google Sites integration

existing_features.title: Create a passcode-protected admin panel that requires entering the passcode '3415' to access the item management interface
Implement item management functionality in the admin panel allowing the admin to add new items with name, description, price, and image
Create a customer-facing storefront page displaying all available items in a grid layout with item images, names, and prices
Implement a shopping cart system where customers can add items by clicking them and view their cart contents
Create a simulated payment checkout flow with a 'Pay Now' button that processes fake cash transactions and shows payment confirmation

Apply a professional, polished visual design suitable for embedding on a Google site with a clean, modern aesthetic including a sophisticated color palette, elegant typography, and professional spacing
Create a useDeleteItem React Query mutation hook in frontend/src/hooks/useItems.ts that calls the backend deleteItem method and invalidates the items query cache on success
Add delete buttons to each item in the ItemList component (frontend/src/components/ItemList.tsx) that trigger the useDeleteItem mutation with confirmation dialog

new_feature_requests.summary: Passcode-protected admin panel (passcode: 3415) to add/manage store items
Customer-facing storefront with clickable items and checkout flow
Simulated payment system with fake cash transactions
Professional appearance suitable for embedding on Google site
Add delete functionality for items in the admin panel
Add a deleteItem method to the backend main actor that accepts an item ID and removes the item from storage
